loginCTA.saveBookingDescription: Login to save your booking history, track your trips, and get faster checkout next time.

infoSection.heading: The smartest way to travel by bus
infoSection.description: Experience seamless bus travel with our comprehensive platform.

feature1.title: Compare bus prices across providers
feature1.description: Find the best deals by comparing prices from multiple bus operators in one place. Save time and money on your journey.

feature2.title: Book tickets instantly
feature2.description: Easy and secure booking process with instant confirmation. Get your e-tickets delivered right to your phone.

feature3.title: 24/7 Customer Support
feature3.description: Complete customer support, easy ticket management and real-time updates. Everything in your pocket.

partnersSection.heading: All your bus travel options in one place
partnersSection.description: More than 100 trusted bus operators nationwide, from intercity coaches to local shuttles, so you can focus on your journey without the hassle of visiting multiple websites.

aboutSection.title: Simplifying Bus Travel Across Europe and the Balkans

intro.p1: Welcome to GoBusly, your go-to platform for seamless bus travel across Europe and the Balkans. Whether you're traveling between bustling cities or heading to charming towns and villages, GoBusly connects you to the region's most reliable bus operators.
intro.p2: Our platform offers access to a wide network of trusted operators, ensuring coverage for both popular routes and off-the-beaten-path destinations. From modern coaches with premium amenities to budget-friendly options, GoBusly caters to every traveler's needs, making your journey as comfortable and convenient as possible.
intro.p3: With GoBusly, you can easily explore destinations in countries like Albania, North Macedonia, Serbia, Greece, and beyond. Discover the beauty of the Balkans with a reliable booking platform that simplifies your travel plans.

aboutSection.operatorsTitle: Connecting You to Trusted Bus Operators

operatorsDescription.p1: GoBusly collaborates with leading bus operators across Europe and the Balkans, offering a variety of services tailored to your travel needs. Whether you're booking an express route between major cities or a local connection to smaller towns, you'll find dependable options on our platform.
operatorsDescription.p2: Our platform features user-friendly search tools that let you filter by operator, route, and amenities. With accurate schedules, competitive prices, and multiple daily departures, GoBusly ensures you'll find a bus that fits your schedule and budget.
operatorsDescription.linkText: Explore operators and routes available on GoBusly →

helpPage.title: Help Center
helpPage.description: Welcome to our Help Center. Find answers to common questions, learn how to use our services, and get the support you need for a smooth bus booking experience.
helpPage.howCanWeHelp: How can we help you today?
helpPage.searchOrBrowse: Search our knowledge base or browse topics below
helpPage.quickLinksDescription: Quickly access important information and tools

infoTabs.generalDescription: Learn about our services and policies
infoTabs.aboutServiceContent: We offer reliable and comfortable bus transportation services across multiple cities. Our fleet consists of modern buses equipped with amenities such as Wi-Fi, power outlets, and onboard entertainment.
infoTabs.routesDestinationsContent: We operate routes connecting major cities and popular destinations. To view our current routes, please visit the "Routes" section of our website or mobile app.
infoTabs.luggagePolicyContent: Each passenger is allowed one piece of luggage (max. 20kg) for the luggage compartment and one piece of hand luggage (max. 7kg) to take on board. Additional or oversized luggage may incur extra fees.
infoTabs.petPolicyContent: Only service animals are allowed on our buses. Pets, including emotional support animals, are not permitted for the comfort and safety of all passengers.
infoTabs.bookingDescription: Learn how to book your bus tickets

howToBookSteps.1: Go to our website or open our mobile app
howToBookSteps.2: Enter your departure and arrival locations
howToBookSteps.4: Choose your preferred bus and seats

paymentMethodsContent.title: We accept various payment methods including:

methods.mobile: Apple Pay and Google Pay (on mobile devices)

infoTabs.seatSelectionContent: You can select your preferred seats during the booking process. Seat selection is subject to availability and may incur an additional fee for premium seats (e.g., extra legroom).
infoTabs.groupBookingsContent: For groups of 10 or more, please contact our group booking department at groups@busbooking.com. We offer special rates and assistance for large group travel.
infoTabs.manageDescription: Learn how to modify or cancel your bookings

modifyBookingSteps.1: Log in to your account on our website or app
modifyBookingSteps.3: Select the booking you want to modify
modifyBookingSteps.6: Pay any difference in fare or fees
modifyBookingSteps.7: Receive a confirmation of your modified booking
modifyBookingSteps.note: Note: Modifications are subject to our change policy and may incur fees.

cancellationPolicyContent.intro: Our cancellation policy is as follows:

policies.full: More than 72 hours before departure: Full refund
policies.none: Less than 24 hours before departure: No refund

cancellationPolicyContent.instructions: To cancel a booking, log in to your account, go to "My Bookings," select the booking you want to cancel, and click on "Cancel Booking."

infoTabs.refundProcessContent: Refunds are processed within 5-10 business days, depending on your payment method. The refund will be issued to the original form of payment used for the booking.
infoTabs.lostTicketContent: If you've lost your e-ticket, you can easily retrieve it by logging into your account and going to "My Bookings." From there, you can resend the e-ticket to your email or download it directly.
infoTabs.faqsDescription: Find answers to common questions about our bus ticket booking service
infoTabs.arrivalTime: How early should I arrive at the bus station?
infoTabs.arrivalTimeContent: We recommend arriving at least 15-30 minutes before your scheduled departure time. This allows time for check-in, luggage storage, and boarding. For popular routes or during peak travel seasons, you may want to arrive up to 45 minutes early.
infoTabs.changeName: Can I change the name on my ticket?
infoTabs.changeNameContent: Name changes are generally not allowed for security reasons. If you need to transfer your ticket to someone else, you'll need to cancel your existing booking (subject to our cancellation policy) and make a new booking under the new passenger's name.
infoTabs.missBus: What happens if I miss my bus?
infoTabs.missBusContent: If you miss your bus, your ticket is typically considered void. However, we understand that unexpected situations can arise. Contact our customer service as soon as possible, and we'll do our best to accommodate you on the next available bus, subject to availability and possible additional fees.
infoTabs.powerOutlets: Are there power outlets on the bus?
infoTabs.powerOutletsContent: Most of our buses are equipped with power outlets for each seat. However, availability may vary depending on the specific bus and route. We recommend bringing a portable charger as a backup, especially for longer journeys.

bookingProcess.title: Booking Process
bookingProcess.description: Follow these steps to book your bus ticket
steps: Visit our website or launch our mobile application
Input your departure and destination locations
Choose your desired bus service and seat
Add any optional services (e.g., extra luggage allowance)
Receive your electronic ticket via email

bookingTips.title: Booking Tips
bookingTips.description: Maximize your booking experience with these helpful tips
tips: Book early to secure preferred seats and potentially lower fares
Check for current promotions or seasonal discounts
Consider flexible travel dates for better deals
Review the cancellation and refund policies
Ensure all booking details are accurate before confirmation
Sign up for our newsletter to receive exclusive offers

affiliateProgramPage.heroDescription: Join our affiliate program and earn up to 5% commission on every ticket sold. It's easy to start and even easier to get paid.
affiliateProgramPage.whyJoinDescription: Our affiliate program is designed to maximize your earnings with minimal effort. Here's why hundreds of affiliates choose us.
affiliateProgramPage.competitiveCommissionsDescription: Earn up to 5% on every ticket sold through your affiliate link, with tiered rates for higher volumes.
affiliateProgramPage.advancedAnalyticsDescription: Track performance in real-time with detailed reports on clicks, conversions, and commissions.
affiliateProgramPage.cookieTrackingDescription: Our 30-day cookie tracking ensures you get credited even if customers book days after clicking your link.
affiliateProgramPage.fastPaymentsDescription: Get paid monthly with no minimum threshold. Choose from multiple payment methods including PayPal and bank transfer.
affiliateProgramPage.marketingResourcesDescription: Access exclusive banners, text links, and promotional content to boost your conversion rates.
affiliateProgramPage.dedicatedSupportDescription: Get personalized support from our dedicated affiliate team to help optimize your performance.
affiliateProgramPage.howItWorksDescription: Getting started with our affiliate program is simple. Follow these steps to begin earning commissions.
affiliateProgramPage.applyDescription: Fill out the simple application form with your details. We'll review and approve qualified applicants within 24 hours.
affiliateProgramPage.promoteDescription: Use your unique affiliate link and marketing materials to promote GoBusly on your website, blog, or social media.
affiliateProgramPage.earnDescription: Track your performance in real-time and receive commissions for every successful booking made through your links.
affiliateProgramPage.commissionStructureDescription: Our tiered commission structure rewards your performance. The more you sell, the higher your commission rate.
affiliateProgramPage.monthlyCommissionDescription: Based on your sales volume each month
affiliateProgramPage.lifetimeCommissionDescription: Based on your total sales over time
affiliateProgramPage.successfulAffiliatesDescription: Hear from our partners who are earning commissions by promoting GoBusly.
affiliateProgramPage.testimonial1Quote: "The GoBusly affiliate program has been a perfect fit for my travel blog. The commission rates are competitive, and my readers love the service. I've been earning consistently for over a year now."
affiliateProgramPage.testimonial2Quote: "I run a deals website and the GoBusly affiliate program has been one of our top performers. Their tracking is reliable, payments are always on time, and their support team is responsive."
affiliateProgramPage.testimonial3Quote: "As a travel influencer, I'm very selective about the brands I partner with. GoBusly has been fantastic - easy to promote, great service for my followers, and the commissions have become a significant part of my income."
affiliateProgramPage.faqDescription: Get answers to the most common questions about our affiliate program.
affiliateProgramPage.faqQuestion1: Who can join the GoBusly affiliate program?
affiliateProgramPage.faqAnswer1: Our affiliate program is open to website owners, bloggers, content creators, and social media influencers with an audience interested in travel. We review all applications to ensure alignment with our brand values.
affiliateProgramPage.faqQuestion2: How and when do I get paid?
affiliateProgramPage.faqAnswer2: We pay commissions on a monthly basis. Payments are processed by the 15th of each month for the previous month's earnings. We offer multiple payment methods including PayPal, bank transfer, and more.
affiliateProgramPage.faqQuestion3: Is there a minimum payout threshold?
affiliateProgramPage.faqAnswer3: Yes, we have a minimum payout threshold of $25. Once your earnings reach this amount, you'll receive payment in the next payment cycle. Earnings below the threshold will roll over to the next month.
affiliateProgramPage.faqQuestion4: How do I track my referrals and commissions?
affiliateProgramPage.faqAnswer4: You'll have access to a comprehensive dashboard that shows real-time data on clicks, conversions, and commissions. Our tracking is cookie-based and lasts for 30 days.
affiliateProgramPage.faqQuestion5: What promotional materials do you provide?
affiliateProgramPage.faqAnswer5: We provide a variety of marketing materials including banners, text links, product images, and promotional content. You can also request custom materials for specific campaigns.
affiliateProgramPage.faqQuestion6: Can I promote through paid advertising?
affiliateProgramPage.faqAnswer6: Yes, affiliates can use paid advertising channels such as Google Ads, social media ads, etc. However, there are some restrictions on brand bidding and trademark usage. Please review our terms and conditions for details.
affiliateProgramPage.becomeAffiliateDescription: Ready to start earning? Fill out the application form below and join our affiliate program today.

affiliateForm.title: Affiliate Application
affiliateForm.description: Fill in your details to apply for our affiliate program.
affiliateForm.passwordDescription: Must be at least 8 characters with mixed case and numbers.
affiliateForm.socialMediaDescription: List your social media handles (Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, etc.)

affiliateForm.submissionDescription: Thank you for applying to the GoBusly Affiliate Program. We've sent a confirmation email to your inbox and will review your application within 24-48 hours.
